odase.concurrency

Interface WaitObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTask, BatchWorker, CallableTask, RunnableTask, WaitObjectSet

    public interface WaitObject
    This interface allows threads to block on the completion of tasks. It can be used in much the same way that a Future is used except it does not provide a return value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractTask getTask()
      Get the actual task that this wait object represents.
      void waitForTask()
      Wait indefinitly for the completion of the task.
      void waitForTask(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Wait for the task to complete.

        Wait for the task to complete. This method may timeout. Waring: I may change the signature of this method.

        InterruptedException
